resources.string:
Read me!
How to use GYIA codes:
1. Login to KFG Napló
2. Open okostelefonos hozzáférés (GYIA)
3. Új kód at the top
4. Click on the magnifying glass, and read the code w/ a QR-reader (eg. NeoReader). Now copy the link and paste it in the app.
5. Do not forget to change the validity of the code, if it expires the app cannot send notifications any longer!
Copy the link found in the GYIA code! (click here)
Notifications between 22:30 and 6:00 do not vibrate and flash LED even if it is set
Unknown error in Karinthy Naplo! Consider trying it again later!
The GYIA code has expired or you gave a wrong code, open the Naplo to renew!
The GYIA code is expired or wrong, please open to renew
You haven\'t got a new grade!
Something has changed. Maybe a grade was changed?

Developer:
Cseh András
App version:
%1$s
Icons by: Freepik & ToffeeNut
Uses Android-Job by evernote
Unofficial app!
No grades were found! If you do have some, try it again later!

Do you want to update the grades database?
It does not update automatically!
It looks like you have no grades yet...
Ordered by subject, with averages, click on grades for details
Grades in table, ordered by subject and date

Your grades are in descending order, ordered by date. Click on them to see more details, eg. the exact date or teacher.
Click on the refresh icon, to redownload all your grades.
In order for Karinthy Napló to work properly, please add it to the list of NOT OPTIMIZED, WHITELISTED or PROTECTED apps
Oh shoot! You need to open the settings app and manually add Karinthy Napló to the whitelisted apps :(
Oh shoot! You need to open the settings app and manually add Karinthy Napló to the protected apps :(
No new substitution in your class!
There is a new substitution in your class!
Change! Some of your previously announced classes will be held!
There is a new substitution, but also something has changed!
STANDINS: Type in your class (using capital letters) eg. 9.AK/10.A
STANDINS: Type in here those lessons of which you don\'t want to get a notification (separated by comma, use accented letters)
Fill in the class field! (use capital letters!)
Standins - teacher: Enter your name here. If your name may be displayed other ways, separate those by comma (strongly recommended!)
There is no new substitution for you!
In order for Karinthy Napló to work properly on Huawei devices, additional settings need to be done. Please, in the next screen set KFGapp to manual control, but leave all other boxes enabled!
Oh no, it did not work :(. Open settings app, select Battery->Launch, and in the next screen set KFGapp to manual control, but leave all other boxes enabled!

The manufacturer of your device has made additional changes in the Android system, which make it impossible for some apps to run in the background. For the proper function of KFGapp please add this app to the list of the exceptions on the next screen (the list with the fewer apps, probably)
Oh no, it did not work :(. Please open the Settings or Device optimizer app and try to find the proper settings manually, otherwise KFGapp will not work properly :(
The Napló (GYIA) URL has been updated!
The KFGapp can only open GYIA links! \nThey always contain the text "view=v_slip"!
Configure how new grades should be shown (eg. with vibration, light, sound)
Configure how new stand-ins should be shown (eg. with vibration, light, sound)
